short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send images to GeoTag-X while you browse

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to send photos to GeoTag-X projects that they find whilst browsing the internet.

To use simply install the plugin and then follow these steps when you find a photo you want to send it

1) Right click the image 
2) Select "Upload image URL to GeoTag-X"
3) Choose the project you want to send it to.

Photos will appear in the project once they have been approved by administration
